data.title: Linen Light Shade - Empire Shade (4 colours + 4 sizes)
data.meta_description: The Empire Shade transforms any space into a haven of warmth and elegance. Drawing inspiration from Noguchi’s timeless style, this spherical lamp shade combines a meticulously woven rattan frame with soft linen fabric, creating a perfect harmony of texture and simplicity.  Imagine the gentle glow of light diffusing thr
data.text:
The Empire Shade transforms any space into a haven of warmth and elegance. Drawing inspiration from Noguchi’s timeless style, this spherical lamp shade combines a meticulously woven rattan frame with soft linen fabric, creating a perfect harmony of texture and simplicity.

Imagine the gentle glow of light diffusing through the Empire Shade, casting a serene ambiance that enhances both commercial and residential interiors. This design masterpiece doesn’t just illuminate a room; it tells a story of craftsmanship and art, effortlessly adding a touch of sophistication wherever it is placed.

Designed to hold its shape naturally, the Empire Shade unfolds into its full form within days of installation, offering the option to add a metal frame for a more structured look. For the best experience, we recommend pairing it with a warm LED bulb to accentuate its natural beauty.

✓ Type : Pendant Shade (pendant only, no electrical cable kit & bulbs included)

✓ Sizes Available : 40cm, 50cm, 60cm, 80cm, 100cm diameter

✓ Materials : Rattan Frame, Linen Fabric

✓ Installation : Metal frame included for optional fuller effect

✓ Recommendation : LED bulb with warm color temperature

I purchased this for my son and his fiancé for Christmas, and they just opened their package the other day after returning from traveling. They absolutely love the lamp, and are excited to hang it. Thank you for making such a lovely product. I'm sure it will look beautiful in their home!
